clintock:BiomoleculePool.NAME: Biomolecule Pool
clintock:BiomoleculePool.FLAVOR:
"[Pure research] is worth every penny it costs."
- Harold Urey
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, gain 3 #ySugars and 3 #yPhosphates.

clintock:Isopropanol.NAME: Isopropanol
clintock:Isopropanol.FLAVOR:
"An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field."
 - Niels Bohr
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #yExhaust all #yStatus cards.

clintock:MG53.NAME: MG53
clintock:MG53.FLAVOR:
"I was taught that the way of progress was neither swift nor easy."
 - Marie Curie
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of battle, heal 1 HP for each #yAmino acid in your #yPolypeptide chain.

clintock:StartCodon.NAME: Start Codon
clintock:StartCodon.FLAVOR:
"Basically, I have been compelled by curiosity."
 - Mary Leakey
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, #yBind #yMethionine to your #yPolypeptide chain.
